content.raw:
Ah, I see what you mean now. It didn't occur to me that these were differences in the dependencies of the project; I thought it was coming from the name of the project, which we could easily infer. I think your suggestion is reasonable.

An alternative which would add more automation would be to have `ign_find_package` append each dependency's tagfile to `IGNITION_DOXYGEN_TAGFILES` whenever the dependency provides that information, similar to what we do for `pkgconfig`. That means for third-party dependencies, we could put tagfile information into their find-modules, and automatically assemble that info for each project.
